text: Volkswagen Passat is a car produced by Volkswagen in 1973. It entered its seventh generation in 2010. ==Passat Mk4== The Volkswagen Passat Mk4 is the fourth generation of the Volkswagen Passat. The Mk4 replaced the Mk3 in 1993, and was replaced by the Mk5 in 1996. ==Passat Mk5== The Volkswagen Passat Mk5 is the fifth generation of the Volkswagen Passat. The Mk5 replaced the Mk4 in 1996, and was replaced by the Mk6 in 2005. ==Passat Mk6== The Volkswagen Passat Mk6 is the sixth generation of the Volkswagen Passat. The Mk6 replaced the Mk5 in 2005, and was replaced by the Mk7 in 2010. ==Passat Mk7== The Volkswagen Passat Mk7 is the seventh generation of the Volkswagen Passat. The Mk7 replaced the Mk6 in 2010. This is the current generation of the Volkswagen Passat. == Gallery == File:Passat Variant 1 Wien.JPG|First generation Passat Mk1 File:VW Passat Kombi front 20070902.jpg|Second generation Passat Mk2 File:VW Passat B3 Variant front 20080222.jpg|Third generation Passat Mk3 File:Vw passat b4 v sst.jpg|fourth generation Passat Mk4 File:Unfallhilfsfahrzeug der U-Bahn-Wache München Passat.JPG|fifth generation Passat Mk5 File:Hands-free Driving.jpg|sixth generation Passat Mk6 File:VW Passat Variant 2.0 TDI BlueMotion Technology Trendline (B7) – Frontansicht (3), 13.
